body:
@adamjstewart Asked me to move the CUDA compiler conflicts from the https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/10252 to the CUDA package since these conflicts are generally applicable.

CUDA compiler conflicts are taken from NVidia's online documentation:
- Covers CUDA version 8.x - 10.x only.  
- Covers Linux only, which is the majority of the use case in HPC.
- Covers x86_64 and ppc64le, but does not cover arm
title: CUDA compiler conflicts for Linux
